short_description: the next step is a business consulting company based in minneapolis, minnesota, united states.
long_description: we help manufacturing businesses of all sizes grow and succeed. we tailor our strategy to your specific needs, whether you want to improve marketing, sales, operations, or product development. so, let's roll up our sleeves and get to work. as a team of manufacturing industry experts, we help minnesota and midwest manufacturers grow their businesses. we have a proven track record in managing international sales and marketing teams, developing new products, leading market research, implementing lean initiatives, executing turnarounds and growth projects, and managing acquisitions. we know what it takes to succeed in the manufacturing industry. with our extensive expertise and commitment to excellence, we can take those issues off your plate, leaving you to focus on what you do best: growing your business. building a business without a marketing strategy is like building a house without a blueprint. it's a waste of time and money. at the next step, we'll help you develop a solid marketing strategy that will help you achieve your business goals.

generated_description: the next step, legally known as the next step inc., is a minneapolis-based consulting agency founded in 2015 by jeff radichel. the company specializes in providing comprehensive consulting services to manufacturing businesses, including sales, marketing, operations, and product development. aims to help businesses achieve sustainable growth and success by offering tailored solutions and leveraging its extensive expertise in the manufacturing industry. the agency has a proven track record of managing international sales and marketing teams, developing new products, implementing lean initiatives, and managing acquisitions.

short_description: the next step inc. is a business consulting company based in minneapolis, minnesota, united states.
long_description: our team has experience leading international technical product businesses and we understand you are already strapped for time and are pressed for growth and execution. the next step brings a crew of battle-tested driven simplifiers, who are wired for problem solving. our motto is simple, no homework and one less problem for our customer. just because i can, doesn't mean i should time and internal expertise are the struggle. often there is not enough in-house of either and if you try to hire for help, you only get a piece of the overall skills you need to solve the greater problem. like so many of us in leadership it is not a question of whether you could figure something out, you are a problem solver yourself, that is why you're in your seat, the problem is time. there is never enough, and you cannot do it all on your own. that is why we believe you shouldn't... have to lead every improvement initiative. have to worry a project is not being driven. have to struggle to find the resources to execute. freeing up your time and helping you grow your business is what it is all about. allowing you to remove the distractions that are getting in the way of driving things forward and bringing clarity to the decisions that need to be made. short circuiting the decision processes with access to the best in class tools and market intel, and a highly trained team at your disposal to execute the tasks you need accomplished. unburdened, confident, excited, and a lot less stress, that is the world we strive to give our customers. what success looks like more time for you additional capabilities better clarity less stress we invite you to visit our website below for more details on how we can help problem solve and grow your business.

generated_description: the next step is a company that specializes in providing problem-solving solutions for international technical product businesses. their team consists of experienced professionals who understand the challenges of time constraints and the need for growth and execution. they offer a team of driven simplifiers who are skilled in problem-solving and aim to free up their clients' time while helping them grow their businesses. by providing access to best-in-class tools, market intel, and a highly trained team, they help streamline decision processes and bring clarity to decision-making. the company's goal is to provide their customers with more time, additional capabilities, better clarity, and less stress.
